meanings.sent1: The noncircular table had sharp corners.
meanings.sent2: The square and noncircular clock stood out in the room.
meanings.sent3: The noncircular pizza slice puzzled the kids at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her noncircular drawing of a house was unique and eye-catching.
meanings.sent5: The noncircular flower petals added an interesting twist to the bouquet.

meanings.definition: Not following a circular path or pattern.
meanings.sent1: The noncircular route took us through the forest.
meanings.sent2: The river flowed in a noncircular manner around the bend.
meanings.sent3: The noncircular dance moves surprised the audience.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts took a noncircular journey through different ideas.
meanings.sent5: The noncircular flight path of the bird caught everyone's attention.
